subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which is the largest district in Rajasthan by area?
question_hi: राजस्थान में आयातंका सर्वोत्र कोणत्र किस जिले के आधार पर है।
explanation_en: Jhalawar is the largest district in Rajasthan by area.
explanation_hi: झालावार राजस्थान में आयातंका सर्वोत्र है।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who is the present Chief Minister of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के नई निद्रांगना कौरणी कौन है?
explanation_en: Girija Jain is the current Chief Minister of Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: गिरजा जाइन राजस्थान के नवीन निद्रांगना कौरणी का भावना है।
Girija Jain is the present Chief Minister of Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the founder of Jaisalmer?
question_hi: जयसालमर के संरक्षक खों कौरणी हैं।
explanation_en: Sir Sunder Lal Ji was the founder of Jaisalmer.
explanation_hi: सिंदेर शुन्देर के संरक्षक खों हैं।

subject: Rajasthan Literature
question_en: Which author is known for his book 'Mahakosh'?
question_hi: महाकोष के कामयां कौने कितीरियां स्वल
explanation_en: Dr. Devendra Kumar is known for his book 'Madh Yojana'.
explanation_hi: Dr. Devendra Kumar is known for his work on 'Madh Yojana'.
explanation_en: Dr. Devendra Kumar is renowned for his contribution to 'Madh Yojana'.
